hints.content:
To find the difference, we start with the length of $\purpleD{\text{Football field}}$ and subtract the length of $\blueE{\text{Soccer field}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e6567283897f6b627b6b6bab28ac364e098a7a57)

$\purpleD{94}\text{ m}-\blueE{75}\text{ m} = \maroonD{\Box}\text{ m}$

Let's subtract to find the difference.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8d9f2fbf84f825d461f8c28bd6ee817bf609cee0)

$\purpleD{94}\text{ m}  - \blueE{75}\text{ m}  = \maroonD{19}\text{ m}$
The football field is $\maroonD{19}\text{ m}$ longer than the soccer field.

question.content:
Yeb measures the length of different sports fields.

Sports field | Length
- | - | -
Soccer | $75 \text { m}$ 
Football | $94 \text { m}$ 
Baseball |  $121 \text { m}$ 

**How much longer is a football field than a soccer field?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] $\text{m}$
